short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your Robinhood Stock and Crypto portfolio to CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Robinhood Portfolio Exporter is a simple and efficient Chrome extension that allows you to export your complete Robinhood portfolio data with just one click.

Designed for investors who want to analyze their investment performance or keep personal records, this extension simplifies the process of obtaining your portfolio information, including stocks and cryptocurrency holdings, in a convenient CSV format.

Key Features:
One-Click Export: Quickly download your portfolio data without any manual copying or pasting.

Comprehensive Data: Export includes essential details for both stocks and crypto assets, such as names, symbols, quantities, current prices, average costs, total returns, and equity values.

CSV Format: Data is exported in CSV format, compatible with Excel, Google Sheets, and other spreadsheet applications for easy analysis.

Secure and Private: All data processing happens locally on your computer. The extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal information.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design ensures that both novice and experienced users can navigate the extension effortlessly.
